text:
A woman ended her life a few days after her 12-year-old son died at MMDA Colony in Maduravoyal. Police said that depressed over her son Manikandan’s death, Gnaneshwari, ended her life by hanging. She was rushed to KMC, where she was declared dead on arrival, they added. “No one knows how the boy died. We are investigating,” said a police officer.

Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline can be contacted at 044 24640050. —Staff Reporter
title: Woman ends life after son’s death
